basics.name: Norianna Jiménez
basics.label: Software engineer
basics.summary: Software engineer with a strong mathematical background and three years of experience in .NET backend systems, with hands-on work in client–server architectures and non-trivial business logic. Known for strong analytical thinking, technical autonomy, and an engineering mindset oriented toward scalable and maintainable solutions.

work.name: Capgemini Engineering
work.summary: Backend development in a production IoT environment, working on data-intensive workflows and analytics. Involved in redesigning a KPI module by re-analyzing business logic, validating data flows, and correcting inconsistencies in production databases to enable reliable insights.

work.name: NTT Data
work.summary: Backend development within enterprise systems, contributing to feature delivery and system integrations. Gained hands-on experience with authentication, middleware, and system-to-system communication in distributed environments.

work.name: Solimat - Lider IT Consulting
work.summary: Early professional experience focused on backend fundamentals and system integration. Worked on automation and inter-system communication, gaining a strong foundation in dependency injection, service design, and message-based architectures.

education.studyType: Higher Vocation Degree in Software Development
